newsitem.title: UK: Daiwa Europe hires director for fixed income.
newsitem.headline: Daiwa Europe hires director for fixed income.

text.p: Daiwa Europe Ltd has appointed Jim Siracusa as managing director in its fixed income division in London, it said in a statement on Friday.
Siracusa will be responsible for global primary bonds, covering fixed income origination and syndication. He will take up the position in mid-May, the statement said.
Siracusa was previously head of global primary markets at Banque Nationale de Paris.
The global primary bond department is part of the newly established global bond unit, which Daiwa set up to internationalise its global fixed income business, the statement said.
